lines.text: You know my sister was engaged with a wooden-legged guy.
Yeah?
She broke it off.
The engagement?
No, the leg.
[Shemp is banging his head on the desk as part as his 'thinking' method]
I've got it! A terrific headache.
Quiet, everyone! Genius at work!
Release that guy who stole eleven bottles of whiskey. I know he's guilty, but the DA said we can't make a case out of eleven bottles.

[answering his phone]
Hello! Yeah! Detective bureau, Sergeant Moe speaking. Oh, wait a minute, Clancy. Go ahead. You say there's a dead horse on Ticonderoga Street? How do you spell "Ticonderoga"? Oh, you don't know, either. Well, drag him over to First Street.
[hangs up]
I have to think of everything.
[accidentally bonking Moe on the head while aiming for a monkey on his desk]
Oh, Moe. Moe. I meant to hit the other monkey.
How dare you look like someone I hate.
The body of your friend Slug McGurk was found wrapped up in newspapers. Now, I know you can't believe everything you see in the newspapers...

[answers phone]
Detective Bureau! Yes, this is Sergeant Moe!
[more gently]
Oh, hello, dear. Why, of course, dear. Oh, sure, you've got nothin' to worry about. Goodbye, sweetheart.
[hangs up phone]
That was the mayor.
[Repeated line]
I have to do everything around here!
Hey, you forgot something!
[she slaps him in the face]
That's what you forgot!
